Class Javac

    public class Javac
extends javax.tools.SimpleJavaFileObject
    This class provides runtime source compilation functionality.

    • Method Detail

      • compile

        public static java.util.List<java.io.File> compile(java.net.URI uri)
                                            throws java.io.IOException
        Compiles a source file specified through a uri, this means that the file should exist on disk somewhere
        Parameters:
        uri - The uri of the source file
        Returns:
        A list of files associated to the compilation output of the uri.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there is an internal error with referencing the uri through a File object
